name: Planet of War
overview: In the year 2250, the PAO spacecraft arrived on the planet Nap, invading it entirely. After 100 years the planet has not yet been liberated and this is how the aliens are still rulers. Now it's your turn to free the planet and luckily your spaceship is greatly upgraded to take on an enemy of this scope. Published in Italy as Planet War in Byte Games n.33 (luglio/agosto 1989).
